metadata.synopsis: Arabella, a young, struggling fashion designer, takes on the role of stylist for an erotic novelist. As Arabella becomes more deeply involved in the author's life, she learns not all is as it seems.

reviews: This winning but nauseatingly upsetting documentary follows three people whose hands you would never, ever want to shake.
Trim off 10 minutes, put some commercials in it, and you'd have a fine hour of television on The Learning Channel. Maybe even the pilot for a series. I know I'd watch.
These guys just aren't interesting. Their jobs just aren't interesting. And the film just isn't interesting.
